articles.author: Newsroom
articles.title: New report underscores the seriousness of Long Covid - Kathimerini English Edition
articles.description: One of the nation’s premier medical advisory organizations has weighed in on long Covid with a 265-page report that recognizes the seriousness and persistence of the condition for millions of Americans.
articles.content: One of the nations premier medical advisory organizations has weighed in on long Covid with a 265-page report that recognizes the seriousness and persistence of the condition for millions of American… [+5085 chars]
